channel.title: Blogs of Kai
channel.description: Recent content on Blogs of Kai

item.title: About me
item.description: I received my PhD scholarship from China in July 2020 when the covid epidemic is spreading around the world. After a long holiday for me, I began my work in industrial ecology at Leiden University in February 2021. My family Seriously I am not a foodie(eat simple while working) but I Do like food and cooking. In my spare time (really scarce), I will dive into my kitchen and make pasta.
